content.question: Consider the curve defined by <math alttext="y squared, equals, x cubed, minus 3 x, plus 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>âˆ’</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></math> for <math alttext="x greater than 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>></mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>. At what value of <math alttext="x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> does the curve have a horizontal tangent?

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator the square root of 3, and denominator 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mstyle><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mstyle></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></math>
There is no such value of <math alttext="x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>.

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
